name: triangulate-image
description: Converts images in to triangular polygons.
author: Georg Fischer <snorpey@gmail.com.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-node && npm run build-browsers
scripts.clean: rimraf dist dist-node && mkdirp dist dist-node
scripts.build-browsers: npm run mk-tmp && npm run browsers-es6 && npm run standard-build && npm run sync-build && npm run async-build && npm run rm-tmp
scripts.browsers-es6: babel src --ignore node,index.js --presets es2015 --plugins object-assign --out-dir dist/tmp
scripts.standard-build: npm run standard-browserify && npm run standard-uglify && npm run standard-beautify
scripts.standard-browserify: browserify -t [ uglifyify --mangle=0 ] --standalone triangulate dist/tmp/browser.js | derequire > dist/tmp/triangulate-image.tmp.js
scripts.sync-build: npm run sync-browserify && npm run sync-uglify && npm run sync-beautify
scripts.sync-browserify: browserify -t [ uglifyify --mangle=0 ] --standalone triangulate dist/tmp/browser-sync.js | derequire > dist/tmp/triangulate-image-sync.tmp.js
scripts.async-build: npm run async-browserify && npm run async-uglify && npm run async-beautify
scripts.async-browserify: browserify -t [ uglifyify --mangle=0 ] --standalone triangulate dist/tmp/browser-async.js | derequire > dist/tmp/triangulate-image-async.tmp.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
